title: Waistcoat, 1740–50
medium:
Medium: wool on cotton; linen and cotton lining
Technique: chain stitch embroidery on 2/2  twill foundation
dimensions: Length: (neck to hem back): 80 cm (31 1/2 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Gentleman's embroidered waistcoat with embroidered decoration of fruits and vines at center front bottom and pocket area.

tombstone.epitaph:

1740–50. Medium: wool on cotton; linen and cotton lining
